meanings: [명사] discovery, detection, [동사] discover, find (out), detect, spot, (formal) sight, (우연히) stumble on[across, upon], chance (up)on, light (up)on, come across

examples.korean: A sharp-eyed reader spotted the mistake in yesterday’s paper. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 눈이 예리한 한 독자가 어제 신문에서 그 실수를 발견해 냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Education is a progressive discovery of our own ignorance. (Will Durant) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 교육은 우리 자신의 무지를 점차 발견해 가는 과정이다. (윌 듀란트, 공부명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Education is a progressive discovery of our own ignorance. (Will Durant) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: In preparing for battle I have always found that plans are useless, but planning is indispensable. (Dwight D. Eisenhower) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 전투를 준비하면서 계획은 무용하나 계획하는 것은 꼭 필요함을 항상 발견해왔다. (드와이트 데이비드 아이젠하워, 노력명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: In preparing for battle I have always found that plans are useless, but planning is indispensable. (Dwight D. Eisenhower) Add to Wordbook
